Name: YGGDRASIL JIGSAW PUZZLE
About the game: Lightweight but powerful. Optimized for Steam Workshop and customizable. Relaxing or hardcore gaming. Control the difficulty by number of pieces and time, obstacle. Basically works in random mode. Also you can play the puzzles you want in the gallery. Easily customize the puzzle images and themes from made with community or yourself. Steam Achievements, Workshop. Cross-platform auto-cloud sync with Steam Cloud. Full Controller support with Steam Input. 1st theme: TOGETHER The first theme with the release is 'TOGETHER' . You can play 100 retouched images with jigsaw puzzle.
